title: Sometimes channel is not fetched if opened after joining community (E2E blocker)

milestone.title: 1.27.0 - Alpha
milestone.description:
### This release *might* be the release that becomes Status Mobile's first public alpha

Mobile dev team priorities In priority order:

**1. Finish anything that wasn't completed in the previous 1.26 cycle**

**2. Fix bugs, both functional and UX fit-and-finish defects.**  

- specifically focus on bugs related to the Communities functionality, when a community is utilizing all the community admin functionality available in Status Desktop

- any remaining UX quality defects

**3. Complete building any Communities functionality that's in the MVP Communities designs and not yet built**  

**4. Work on any outstanding ad-hoc group chat functionality as per the MVP spec**  

- Test with Status Desktop to ensure mobile and desktop interop in all aspects of ad-hoc group chat functionality.


**--- Things that should NOT be worked on this cycle ---**

- We shouldn't start anything in Settings or Profile related, with the exception of Wallet setting that the Mobile Wallet team may work on.

body:
According to @Parveshdhull [comment](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17704#issuecomment-1778973906) this issue might require fix on status-go side.

This issues is often caught by our e2e causing the whole group of tests to fail. So it can be considered as test blocker. 

Sometimes this bug is also reproducible manually.

**Steps:** 

1. User A creates community which does not require admin manual approval. Use PR build to create community from mobile. 
2. User A sends community invite to User B
3. User B sends Request to join the community
4. Wait until community status is changed to Joined for User B
5. User B opens community channel
6. See if channel is fetched


**Actual result:** sometimes channel is not fetched

[logs (11).zip](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/files/13068070/logs.11.zip)

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/97245802/162146e5-2e12-4589-ae82-7f0e1dc9a318

**Expected result:** channel is fetched

### Additional Information

- Status version: nightly 
- Operating System: Android, iOS
